projects: [{"title":"Data Science Library for Financials","start_date":"Jul 2021","description":"-Creating and Building of different libraries and algorithm of Statistics and Data Science which could be utilized by their Data Scientist (Research and development) -A complex and time constrained project in which we had to match the efficiency with paid software’s like SAS from the open source software like python -Build several libraries and tools like RAMP, Univariate Stats, NLP modules like Wrangler from scratch -Few of the tools were dash oriented. -Need to complete our tool with pytest testing with 100% coverage and standardize our code as per scipy module. -We have developed More than 40+ libraries (total of 52) -Technical: Python(Advance), Pandas, SAS, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Linear & Polynomial Regression, reverse GridsearchCV , Dash, Git, Spacy, Scipy, Statsmodels, pytest"},{"title":"GCP Machine Learning Pipeline For sentiment analysis","start_date":"Mar 2021","end_date":"May 2021","description":"Working and leaning on GCP to make a MVP of OCR and NLP on streaming live data."},{"title":"OCR with sentiment analysis","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Mar 2021","description":"OCR + NLP sentiment analysis on NER as an application to customer (MVP)"},{"title":"All in One ML Project","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Feb 2021","description":"Projects IncludedBoston House Price Prediction.Diabetis PredictionHeart Disease Prediction.Admission Chance Prediction.Car Price Prediction.Loan Approval Prediction.Data Science Salary Prediction.Employee Attrition Prediction.Cardiovascular Disease prediction."},{},{"title":"AUTO EASY EDA APP","start_date":"Nov 2020","end_date":"Jan 2021","description":"With the help of AUTO EASY EDA APP we can do EDA within few minutes.
